snippet: Our colleagues at The New York Times Magazine have unveiled their annual Food and Drink issue.
abstract: Our colleagues at The New York Times Magazine have unveiled their annual Food and Drink issue.
lead_paragraph: Our colleagues at The New York Times Magazine have unveiled their annual Food & Drink issue. Mark Bittman examines California’s Central Valley, past Times restaurant critics reminisce, Sam Anderson reports on a former Silicon Valley consultant who is trying to replicate Italy’s perfect buffalo mozzarella, and more. Go to the Magazine »
